Author: Christian Wylonis
Post Text: Last week, we made the difficult decision to significantly reduce our team, saying goodbye to 27 extremely talented colleagues. Along with many others, The Org is weathering the current economic climate and doing what we can to get through it. We will continue in a leaner setup with our belief in public org charts stronger than ever. I want to thank everyone leaving us for their efforts and commitments to the company. We will miss you¬†‚ù§Ô∏è
